author: franzihei
content:
Hey there! 

Just wanted to let y'all know that the **Solidity Developer Survey 2023** is live! ğŸ¥³ 

Like in previous years, this survey helps us to collect user feedback and input on the future roadmap of Solidity. We hope it's also of value for the Ethereum ecosystem as a whole since we include statistics on tool usage and other EVM languages as well. 

Last year, we received 1401 entries from 100 different countries across the globe.

Please participate & help us spread the word about it! Thanks! ğŸ’—

author: timbeiko
content:
Wow, I guess today is the day of protocol-adjacent announcements - I had one too ğŸ˜… ! 

Over the summer, the EF has funded a group of 30+ researchers to explore a wide range of questions around "protocols" across a wide range of domains, from the web, to architecture, memory, and more.  

Most of it is only adjacent to Ethereum, but a few topics are pretty closely linked (e.g. how do protocols die). This Wednesday, we'll be releasing the first batch of research outputs. Everything will be freely accessible online, and we'll be giving out a limited number of print copies to people interested in studying protocols as a first class topic. 

More info & stream link here: https://bit.ly/protocolkit-launch â˜€ï¸
